typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OriginAirportCode as string,
		Month as integer,
		DayofMonth as integer,
		CRSDepHour as integer,
		DayOfWeek as integer,
		Carrier as string,
		DestAirportCode as string,
		DepDel15 as integer,
		WindSpeed as integer,
		SeaLevelPressure as integer,
		HourlyPrecip as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceDataFlowELT
sourceDataFlowELT window(over(Carrier),
	asc(Month, true),
	asc(DayofMonth, true),
	NumFila = rowNumber()) ~> NumFila
